name: enchanted thread
description: A small quantity of magic infused thread that could be used to refill a sewing kit. It has been infused with magic so that it can be used for enchanting.

name: enchanted copper thread
description: A small quantity of magic infused thread that could be used to refill a sewing kit. It has been infused with magic so that it can be used for enchanting.

name: enchanted silver thread
description: A small quantity of magic infused thread that could be used to refill a sewing kit. It has been infused with magic so that it can be used for enchanting.

name: enchanted gold thread
description: A small quantity of magic infused thread that could be used to refill a sewing kit. It has been infused with magic so that it can be used for enchanting.

name: enchanted bearing
description: A box of ball bearings, useful as ammunition for slings or slingshots. Enchanted to hit harder and go further.

name: slammer bearing
description: A box of ball bearings, useful as ammunition for slings or slingshots. Enchanted to go further and hit harder, this one also hits like a brick and can knock enemies down.

name: shot bearing
description: A box of ball bearings, useful as ammunition for slings or slingshots. Enchanted to go further and hit harder, this one also shatters into pieces like a shotgun blast.
